page.title: 08POCKET MONEY - A BOY
page.content: I AM A THIRTEEN YEAR OLD BOY AND I GET MY POCKET MONEY BY DOING A PAPER ROUND IN THE MORNINGS FOR WHICH I GET Â£6 PER WEEK. THIS IS A GOOD JOB IN THE SUMMER WHEN THE WEATHER IS NICE AND WARM BUT IN THE WINTER I DO NOT LIKE THE DARK AND WET MORNINGS.SOMETIMES I GET SOME MONEY FROM MY PARENTS, ESPECIALLY IF I DO EXTRA WORK FOR THEM IN THE HOUSE. I HAVE GOT TO LOOK AFTER MY OWN BEDROOM AND KEEP IT TIDY. I SPEND MY MONEY ON RECORDS OR CASSETTES.I LIKE POPULAR MUSIC A LOT. I ALSO BUY SWEETS AND CRISPD ETC. IN SCHOOL FOR BREAKTIME. I KEEP SOME MONEY FOR MORE EXPENSIVE THINGS LIKE A NEW STEREO OR REPAIRS FOR MY BIKE.
